amendment.description: Amendment adds a new paragraph to provide that any limitation on funds to carry out research related to the production, processing, or marketing of tobacco or tobacco plants shall not apply to research on the medical, biotechnological, food and industrial uses of tobacco.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new paragraph to provide that any limitation on funds to carry out research related to the production, processing, or marketing of tobacco or tobacco plants shall not apply to research on the medical, biotechnological, food and industrial uses of tobacco.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hayes amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
